title: Height levels collection Met Office UKV 2km deterministic forecast

cloud_amount_on_height_levels.title: Cloud amount on height levels
cloud_amount_on_height_levels.description: Fraction of horizontal grid square occupied by cloud in layers centred on height levels.

wind_direction_on_height_levels.title: Wind direction on height levels
wind_direction_on_height_levels.description: Wind direction on height levels is defined as a two-dimensional (horizontal) air velocity vector with no vertical component. In meteorological reports the direction of the wind vector is given as the direction from which it is blowing.

wind_speed_on_height_levels.title: Wind speed on height levels
wind_speed_on_height_levels.description: Wind speed on height levels is defined as a two-dimensional (horizontal) air velocity vector with no vertical component. The speed is the magnitude of velocity.

msft:short_description: Met Office UK Deterministic Height Level
